requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 11.0
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 / Apple M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 580X / Apple M1
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 12.0
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1 Pro
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
